28 # INSTALLATION
29 # - create ROS package in your workspace:
30 # $ catkin_create_pkg smach_tutorial std_msgs rospy
31 # - move this file to the 'smach_tutorial/scr' folder and give running permissions to it with
32 # $ chmod +x state_machine.py
33 # - run the 'roscore' and then you can run the state machine with
34 # $ rosrun smach_tutorial state_machine.py
35 # - install the visualiser using
36 # $ sudo apt-get install ros-kinetic-smach-viewer
37 # - run the visualiser with
38 # $ rosrun smach_viewer smach_viewer.py
39 # source ~/my_ros/devel/setup.bash

41 rec_cmd = 'goNormal'
42 tgx = 0
43 tgy = 0

45 global detected
46 detected = 0
47 global status
48 status = 0
49 
50 def detectedCallback(data):
51  """Callback to read an integer from a topic
52  this integer tells if the ball has been detected or not
53 
54 
55  """
56  global detected
57  detected = data.data
58

61 
62 def random_coord():
63  """Generates a random coordinate
64 
65  Returns:
66  [int]: [integer coordinate]
67  """
68  return random.choice([-6, -4, -2, 0, 2, 4, 6])
69 
70 def cmdCallback(data):
71  global status
72  if data.status_list:
73  statuslist = data.status_list
74  #print(statuslist)
75  #print(statuslist[0].status)
76  #rospy.loginfo(rospy.get_caller_id() + "I heard %s", statuslist[1])
77  status = statuslist[0].status
78  else:
79  status = 0
80 
81 # define state Sleep
82 class Sleep(smach.State):
83  """Defines the state SLEEP
84 
85 
86  """
87  def __init__(self):
88  # initialisation function, it should not wait
89  smach.State.__init__(self,
90  outcomes=['goSleep','goNormal'],
91  input_keys=['sleep_counter_in'],
92  output_keys=['sleep_counter_out'])
93  self.pub = rospy.Publisher('miro_state', std_msgs.msg.Int32 , queue_size=1)
94  self.pubgoal = rospy.Publisher('/reaching_goal2/goal', motion_plan.msg.PlanningActionGoal, queue_size=10)
95  global status
96 
97  def execute(self, userdata):
98  # function called when exiting from the node, it can be blacking
99  hello_str = 0
100  #rospy.loginfo(hello_str)
101  self.pub.publish(hello_str)
102  plan = motion_plan.msg.PlanningActionGoal()
103  plan.goal.target_pose.pose.position.x = -6
104  plan.goal.target_pose.pose.position.y = -6
105  self.pubgoal.publish(plan)
106  rospy.loginfo('SLEEP, miro is tired, commands will be ignored for some time')
107  #time.sleep(15)
108  while status!=3:
109  #rospy.loginfo("status is %d"%status)
110  time.sleep(1)
111  time.sleep(5)
112 
113  userdata.sleep_counter_out = 0
114  return 'goNormal'
115 
116 
117 # define state NORMAL
118 class Normal(smach.State):
119  """Defines the state NORMAL
120 
121 
122  """
123  def __init__(self):
124  smach.State.__init__(self,
125  outcomes=['goSleep','goNormal', 'goPlay'],
126  input_keys=['sleep_counter_in'],
127  output_keys=['sleep_counter_out'])
128  self.Normal_counter = 0
129  self.pub = rospy.Publisher('miro_state', std_msgs.msg.Int32 , queue_size=1)
130  #rospy.Subscriber("ext_command", assignment1.msg.Command, cmdCallback)
131  global detected
132  self.pubgoal = rospy.Publisher('/reaching_goal2/goal', motion_plan.msg.PlanningActionGoal, queue_size=10)
133  rospy.Subscriber("/reaching_goal2/status", actionlib_msgs.msg.GoalStatusArray, cmdCallback)
134  global status
135  self.canc_goalpub = rospy.Publisher('/reaching_goal2/cancel', GoalID , queue_size=1)
136 
137  self.rate = rospy.Rate(200) # Loop at 200 Hz
138 
139  def execute(self, userdata):
140  while not rospy.is_shutdown():
141  rospy.Subscriber("object_detection", Int32, detectedCallback)
142  plan = motion_plan.msg.PlanningActionGoal()
143  #check to see if previous planning action has suceeded
144  if detected == 0 and (status==0 or status ==3):
145 
146  plan.goal.target_pose.pose.position.x = random_coord()
147  plan.goal.target_pose.pose.position.y = random_coord()
148  #rospy.loginfo('going to point')
149  self.pubgoal.publish(plan)
150  time.sleep(1)
151 
152  if detected == 1:
153  #cancel the actual command and go to play state
154  canc = GoalID()
155 
156  self.canc_goalpub.publish(canc)
157  return 'goPlay'
158 
159 
160  hello_str = 1
161  #rospy.loginfo(hello_str)
162  self.pub.publish(hello_str)
163  time.sleep(1)
164  userdata.sleep_counter_out = userdata.sleep_counter_in + 1
165  if (userdata.sleep_counter_in+1>120):
166  return 'goSleep'
167 
168  self.Normal_counter += 1
169  self.rate.sleep
170 
171 class Play(smach.State):
172  """Defines the state PLAY
173 
174 
175  """
176  def __init__(self):
177  smach.State.__init__(self,
178  outcomes=['goSleep','goNormal', 'goPlay'],
179  input_keys=['sleep_counter_in'],
180  output_keys=['sleep_counter_out'])
181  self.Play_counter = 0
182  self.pub = rospy.Publisher('miro_state', std_msgs.msg.Int32 , queue_size=1)
183  self.rate = rospy.Rate(200) # Loop at 200 Hz
184 
185  def execute(self, userdata):
186  while not rospy.is_shutdown():
187 
188  hello_str = 2
189  #rospy.loginfo(hello_str)
190  self.pub.publish(hello_str)
191  rospy.loginfo('PLAY, chasing ball')
192  time.sleep(1)
193  userdata.sleep_counter_out = userdata.sleep_counter_in + 1
194  if (userdata.sleep_counter_in+1>120):
195  return 'goSleep'
196  #if the ball stops being detected count and after some time if nothing is detected go back to normal state
197  if detected == 0:
198  self.Play_counter = self.Play_counter +1
199  if detected == 1:
200  self.Play_counter = 0
201 
202 
203  if self.Play_counter > 5:
204  self.Play_counter = 0
205  return 'goNormal'
206 
207  self.rate.sleep
208 
209 
210 
211 def main():
212  """Initialization of the finite state machine
213  """
214  rospy.init_node('miro_state_machine')
215 
216  # Create a SMACH state machine
217  sm = smach.StateMachine(outcomes=['container_interface'])
218  sm.userdata.sm_counter = 0
219 
220 
221 
222 
223  # Open the container
224  with sm:
225 
226  smach.StateMachine.add('NORMAL', Normal(),
227  transitions={'goSleep':'SLEEP',
228  'goNormal':'NORMAL',
229  'goPlay':'PLAY'},
230  remapping={'sleep_counter_in':'sm_counter',
231  'sleep_counter_out':'sm_counter'})
232  smach.StateMachine.add('SLEEP', Sleep(),
233  transitions={'goSleep':'SLEEP',
234  'goNormal':'NORMAL'},
235  remapping={'sleep_counter_in':'sm_counter',
236  'sleep_counter_out':'sm_counter'})
237  smach.StateMachine.add('PLAY', Play(),
238  transitions={'goSleep':'SLEEP',
239  'goNormal':'NORMAL',
240  'goPlay':'PLAY',},
241  remapping={'sleep_counter_in':'sm_counter',
242  'sleep_counter_out':'sm_counter'})
243 
244 
245 
246 
247  # Create and start the introspection server for visualization
248  sis = smach_ros.IntrospectionServer('server_miro', sm, '/SM_ROOT')
249  sis.start()
250 
251  # Execute the state machine
252  outcome = sm.execute()
253 
254 
255  # Wait for ctrl-c to stop the application
256  rospy.spin()
257  sis.stop()
258 
259 
260 if __name__ == '__main__':
261  main()
